item.description:
Hey Salsa Fans:

Join me for another hot night of LIVE MUSIC and dance at Ryles Jazz Club, one of our favorite hot spots!

 

Time  Saturday, November 5 at 8:30pm - November 6 at 1:00am
Location Ryles Jazz and Cabaret Club
Created By Ritmo Masacote

 

 

 

More Info

EXPERIENCE THE CUBANO'S NIGHTS EXCITEMENT!

8:30-9:00pm FREE RUEDA LESSON by Amanda Gill
9:00pm SHOWTIME!
Only $15 ALL NIGHT!
... By popular demand, Ritmo Masacote is back at Ryles Jazz Club on a SATURDAY night.

"Come hang with the Masacote family in a very warm and welcoming atmosphere. You can come in early for dinner and stay late for all the high energy the band provides for non-stop dancing. We will also have great Cuban/Timba music spinning between sets!

We love the roots, the culture and the feel that Afro-Cuban Music provides and we are trying to bring in a stronger appreciation for it, so help us spread the word!"

Experience the Excitement!

http://www.ritmomasacote.com/

WATCH THE DEMO!
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CD-rexy0WRM

See you there !!

 

-Angel
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing a fedora hat !!

group.name: The Boston & Cambridge Salsa Meetup Group

item.name: Ritmo Masacote is back at Ryles Jazz Club !!
